 {{ $json.articles[1].title }}

parameters.subject: News Headlines

parameters.content:
üì∞ AI News Digest Agent: Auto News Summarizer & Emailer
Automatically fetch top news headlines, generate AI-powered summaries, and send personalized digests to your subscriber list. Perfect for:
‚úÖ Newsletter creators ‚Äî deliver curated news content effortlessly
‚úÖ Teams & organizations ‚Äî keep everyone informed with regular updates
‚úÖ Content curators ‚Äî transform news into digestible insights

‚öôÔ∏è What's Used
n8n Nodes:
Schedule Trigger ‚Üí News API ‚Üí AI Agent ‚Üí OpenAI Chat Model ‚Üí Google Sheets ‚Üí Gmail
External Tools:

NewsAPI ‚Äì Fetch latest headlines from reliable sources
OpenAI GPT-4 ‚Äì Generate concise 5-bullet summaries
Google Sheets ‚Äì Manage subscriber email lists
Gmail ‚Äì Send personalized news digests


üîë Setup ‚Äì Credentials Needed

NewsAPI Key ‚Üí Free account at newsapi.org for headline access
OpenAI API Key ‚Üí For AI-powered news summarization
Google Sheets OAuth2 ‚Üí Access subscriber email lists
Gmail OAuth2 ‚Üí Send automated newsletter emails


üìä Google Sheets Structure Required
Create a simple subscriber spreadsheet:

Name (subscriber's name for personalization)
Email (recipient email addresses)


üöÄ Workflow Steps

Scheduled News Collection
Runs every 10 minutes to fetch latest US headlines from NewsAPI
AI-Powered Summarization
GPT processes news headlines and creates concise 5-bullet summaries
Subscriber List Access
Retrieves email list from Google Sheets for distribution
Personalized Email Delivery
Sends customized news digests to each subscriber with their name


üí° Pro Tips

Customize the country parameter (US, UK, CA, etc.) for regional news
Adjust schedule frequency based on your audience preferences
Add category filters (technology, business, sports) for niche newsletters
Monitor email delivery rates and subscriber engagement
Test with small subscriber lists before scaling up


üõ†Ô∏è Customize It

Add multiple news sources for comprehensive coverage
Include trending topics and sentiment analysis
Connect to Mailchimp or other email marketing platforms
Add unsubscribe functionality and list management
Create different digest formats (daily, weekly, breaking news)
